chapter.text: nowpel del phendei trauv ban ke thveu aoy ronhchuoy yeang khlangokla
haey phendei ban b po ch nh nouv sakasap teangoasa del mean nowknong khluon robsa vea
haey mnoussa lok ka niyeay tha tae mean rueng avei kaet laeng champoh phendei nih
now thngai noh vea nung brakeasabrab nouv ruengreav robsa vea
piproh mcheasa robsa anak ban banhchea aoy vea thveu dauchnaoh
now thngai noh der mnoussa lok nung chenhpi phnaur mk teang krom khosa knea daembi ttuol kar bangheanh aoy kheunh nouv ampeu teanglay robsa puokke
dau che neah anak del thveu ampeula saumbi mean tomngon bon lomangthouli ka ke nung kheunh vea der
chamnek e anak del thveuampeu akrak saumbi mean tomngon bon lomangthouli ka ke nung meulkheunh vea der
